test_cases.question: Yes, this is my phone number
test_cases.expected_answer:
Great! I'll send a verification code to your phone number now.

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: current user phone number
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***7843
Actual output: I've sent a verification code to your phone number. Please enter the 6-digit code you received.

test_cases.question: I want to verify my phone number
test_cases.expected_answer:
I'll send a verification code to your phone number now.

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: current user phone number
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***7843
Actual output: I've sent a verification code to your phone number. Please enter the 6-digit code you received.

test_cases.question: Send me an OTP code
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've sent a verification code to your phone number.

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: current user phone number
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***7843
Actual output: I've sent a verification code to your phone number. Please enter the 6-digit code you received.

test_cases.question: My verification code is 123456
test_cases.expected_answer:
Perfect! Your phone number has been successfully verified.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '123456'
Tool output: Phone verification successful. User status: KYC_NEEDED
Actual output: Perfect! Your phone number has been successfully verified. You can now proceed with KYC verification.

test_cases.question: Update my phone number to +91 9068673843
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've successfully updated your phone number.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '+91 9068673843'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to +91 9068673843
Actual output: I've successfully updated your phone number to +91 9068673843.

test_cases.question: Change my phone number
test_cases.expected_answer: I can help you update your phone number. Please provide your new phone number with country code (example: +1-555-123-4567):

I couldn't verify that code. Please try again.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '789012'
Tool output: Invalid OTP code. Verification failed
Actual output: I couldn't verify that code. Please check the code and try again, or I can resend a new verification code if needed.

test_cases.question: Resend the code please
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've sent a new verification code to your phone number.

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: current user phone number
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***7843
Actual output: I've sent a new verification code to your phone number. Please check your messages.

test_cases.question: My number is +1-555-123-4567, send OTP
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've updated your phone number and sent a verification code.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '+1-555-123-4567'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to +1-555-123-4567

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: updated phone number '+1-555-123-4567'
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***4567
Actual output: I've updated your phone number to +1-555-123-4567 and sent a verification code.

test_cases.question: The code is 555666
test_cases.expected_answer:
Your phone number has been successfully verified.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '555666'
Tool output: Phone verification successful. User status: KYC_NEEDED
Actual output: Your phone number has been successfully verified. You can now proceed with KYC verification.

test_cases.question: Wrong phone number on my account
test_cases.expected_answer: I can help you update your phone number. Please provide your new phone number with country code (example: +1-555-123-4567):

That code appears to be invalid. Please try again.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '12345'
Tool output: Invalid OTP code. Code must be 6 digits
Actual output: That code appears to be invalid or expired. Please try entering the code again, or I can send you a new one.

test_cases.question: Update to +44 7700 900123
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've successfully updated your phone number.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '+44 7700 900123'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to +44 7700 900123
Actual output: I've successfully updated your phone number to +44 7700 900123.

test_cases.question: mb it was +91 7505179010
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've updated your phone number and sent a new verification code.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '+91 7505179010'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to +91 7505179010

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: updated phone number '+91 7505179010'
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***9010
Actual output: I've updated your phone number to +91 7505179010 and sent a new verification code.

Perfect! Your phone number has been successfully verified.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '987654'
Tool output: Phone verification successful. User status: FULL_USER
Actual output: Perfect! Your phone number has been successfully verified. You now have full access to your account.

test_cases.question: What's my current phone number?
test_cases.expected_answer: This doesn't appear to be a phone number update request. If you'd like to update your phone number, please let me know your new number.

test_cases.question: I need to verify my phone
test_cases.expected_answer:
I'll send a verification code to your phone number.

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: current user phone number
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***7843
Actual output: I've sent a verification code to your phone number. Please enter the 6-digit code you received.

test_cases.question: My new number is (555) 123-4567
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've successfully updated your phone number.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '(555) 123-4567'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to (555) 123-4567
Actual output: I've successfully updated your phone number to (555) 123-4567.

That code appears to be too long. Please enter the correct code.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '1234567'
Tool output: Invalid OTP code. Code must be exactly 6 digits
Actual output: That code appears to be too long. Please enter the 6-digit code you received.

test_cases.question: Code: 456789
test_cases.expected_answer:
Your phone number has been successfully verified.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '456789'
Tool output: Phone verification successful. User status: KYC_NEEDED
Actual output: Your phone number has been successfully verified. You can now proceed with KYC verification.

test_cases.question: I didn't receive the code
test_cases.expected_answer:
I'll send a new verification code to your phone number.

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: current user phone number
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***7843
Actual output: I've sent a new verification code to your phone number. Please check your messages.

test_cases.question: Change my number to +49 30 12345678
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've successfully updated your phone number.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '+49 30 12345678'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to +49 30 12345678
Actual output: I've successfully updated your phone number to +49 30 12345678.

test_cases.question: The verification code is 111111
test_cases.expected_answer:
I couldn't verify that code. Please try again.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '111111'
Tool output: Invalid OTP code. Verification failed
Actual output: I couldn't verify that code. It appears to be invalid. Please try again or I can send a new code.

test_cases.question: Send OTP to +1 415 555 7392
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've updated your phone number and sent a verification code.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '+1 415 555 7392'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to +1 415 555 7392

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: updated phone number '+1 415 555 7392'
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***7392
Actual output: I've updated your phone number to +1 415 555 7392 and sent a verification code.

That code doesn't appear to be valid. Please try again.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '000000'
Tool output: Invalid OTP code. Verification failed
Actual output: That code doesn't appear to be valid. Please enter the 6-digit code from your SMS, or I can send a new one.

test_cases.question: I want to modify my phone number to +86 138 0013 8000
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've successfully updated your phone number.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '+86 138 0013 8000'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to +86 138 0013 8000
Actual output: I've successfully updated your phone number to +86 138 0013 8000.

test_cases.question: Can you send me another code?
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've sent a new verification code to your phone number.

Tool called: sendPhoneOtp with input: current user phone number
Tool output: OTP sent successfully to phone number ending in ***8000
Actual output: I've sent a new verification code to your phone number. Please check your messages.

test_cases.question: Here's the code: 654321
test_cases.expected_answer:
Perfect! Your phone number has been successfully verified.

Tool called: checkPhoneOtp with input: code '654321'
Tool output: Phone verification successful. User status: FULL_USER
Actual output: Perfect! Your phone number has been successfully verified. You now have full access to your account.

test_cases.question: Phone verification failed multiple times
test_cases.expected_answer: It looks like we're having trouble verifying your phone number right now. I'd recommend connecting you with our support team so they can help you directly. Would you like me to connect you with support now?

test_cases.question: My phone is 555.123.4567
test_cases.expected_answer:
I've successfully updated your phone number.

Tool called: updateUser with input: phoneNumber '555.123.4567'
Tool output: User phone number updated successfully to 555.123.4567
Actual output: I've successfully updated your phone number to 555.123.4567.
